KONGU ENGINEERING COLLEGE.
Kongu Engineering College is located in Toppupalayam, Perundurai, Erode district.
Kongu Engineering College has state-of-the-art infrastructure with modern facilities.

Kongu Engineering College's campus is equipped with modern facilities and state-of-the-art infrastructure. 1. Physical Education 2. Hostel and Accommodation 3. Transport 4. Dispensary & Ambulance Service 5. WiFi Facility. 6. FoodCourt and Amenity Centre 7. KVB Bank & ATM facility 8. Post Office 9. 24x7 Power Supply and Security

Fees for Computer Sceience Engineering (CSE): Management Fee: Rs.1,40,000/- , Counselling Fee: Rs.1,10,000/-

The placement cell has been functioning in our campus since 1998. Placement Cell serves as a bridge between the academic world and the professional realm, facilitating the transition of students from the classroom to the workplace. Placement Cells have evolved significantly over the years and moved beyond merely organizing campus interviews to offering comprehensive career development services. The integration of technology has streamlined the job search process, allowing students to access job listings and resources online. Furthermore, Placement Cells now recognize the importance of holistic development. We focus on nurturing not only technical skills but also interpersonal skills, emotional intelligence, and adaptability, as these qualities are highly valued by employers.

Placement report for the 2023 Batch, around 265 companies visited the campus till March 2023 for placements. A total of 1943 offers were made by the participating companies. Up to March 2023, as many as 1447 students were placed. The average salary package for 2023 is 4.8LPA.
Highest salary Package: 40LPA.
Average Salary package for 2023 batch students: 4.8 LPA
Fees for Computer Sceience Engineering (CSE): Management Fee: Rs.1,40,000/- , Counselling Fee: Rs.1,00,000/-
Principal: Dr.V.Balusamy
Circuit Branches in Kongu Engineering College: CSE, IT, ECE, CSD, AI-ML, AI-DS.
Non-Circuit Branches in Kongu Engineering College: EEE, EIE, Mechanical, Civil, Mechatronics, Food Technology, Chemical, Naturopathy.

patterns: dress code for boys and girls
response: Boys should wear only formal shirts and cotton pant and shoes (Black or Brown Colour). Girls should wear only churidar with dhuppatta or sarees and shoes (Black or Brown Colour).
There are around 3 Ladies hostel and 7 Mens hostel. Also, there are 2 Alumni Guest House and a Staff Quarters.
